description.en: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで運命の出会いを果たした、健太と千尋。奥手すぎて最初の一歩を踏み出せずにいるふたりが、健太の浜松への転勤をきっかけに急進展。なんと…交際ゼロ日で結婚することに！　

お互いをよく知らないまま夫婦になったふたりは、毎週末のBBQでじっくり仲を深めていく――。
description.ru: После роковой встречи через приложение для знакомств, Кента и Чихиро решили пожениться с нулевым количеством дней знакомств в свете перевода Кенты. Как пара, которая вышла замуж, не зная многого друг о друге, они развивают свои отношения путём регулярных выходных с барбекю.
description.pt-br: Quando Kenta, de 30 anos, conhece a designer gráfica Chihiro, ele queima seu exterior descolado com sua paixão por churrasco! Agora, após um lampejo de namoro, eles são recém-casados! Embora seus empregos os mantenham separados, eles ainda têm fins de semana juntos para grelhar, e carne boa não é a única coisa que está esquentando neste relacionamento escaldante!

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, her soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

altTitles.tr: Rosario + Vampire - Tılsımlı Kolye ve Vampir: Sezon 2

description.en:
The story continues where the first season left off only months into the future. Yuokai Gakuen has been repaired and the new semester is underway. Tsukune and gang are back, and more powerful then ever. Anti-Thesis's true identity is relieved. With new adversaries looming on the horizon, and something much more sinister then the gang has ever faced before.   
  
Tsukune is battling with the monster inside him. With the help of Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby, and Yukari. Tsukune trains to get his vampire blood under control and the strength to protect what he holds dear.  
  
The new season focuses more on the girls, their past, and their families. New confrontations await them. New friends and allies will join them by their side. Together they will discover the secrets of Moka's rosary, and her lineage…  
  


---
description.es:
La historia continúa donde la primera temporada dejó sólo unos meses en el futuro. Yuokai Gakuen ha sido reparado y el nuevo semestre está en marcha. Tsukune y su pandilla están de vuelta, y son más poderosos que nunca. La verdadera identidad de Anti-Tesis es relevada. Con nuevos adversarios que se avecinan en el horizonte, y algo mucho más siniestro de lo que la pandilla ha enfrentado antes.   
  
Tsukune está luchando con el monstruo que lleva dentro. Con la ayuda de Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby y Yukari. Tsukune se entrena para tener su sangre de vampiro bajo control y la fuerza para proteger lo que más quiere.  
  
La nueva temporada se centra más en las chicas, su pasado y sus familias. Nuevos enfrentamientos les esperan. Nuevos amigos y aliados se les unirán a su lado. Juntos descubrirán los secretos del rosario de Moka, y su linaje…
description.tr: İlk sezonun kaldığı yerden sadece aylar sonra devam ediyor. Yuokai Okulu onarılmış ve yeni dönem başlamıştır. Tsukune ve çetesi geri dönmüştür ve her zamankinden daha güçlüdür. Anti-Thesis'in gerçek kimliği ortaya çıktı. Ufukta beliren yeni düşmanlar ve çetenin daha önce karşılaştığından çok daha kötü bir şey var.  Tsukune içindeki canavarla savaşıyor. Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby ve Yukari'nin yardımıyla. Tsukune, vampir kanını kontrol altına almak ve değer verdiği şeyleri koruyacak gücü elde etmek için antrenman yapıyor.    Yeni sezon daha çok kızlara, geçmişlerine ve ailelerine odaklanıyor. Onları yeni yüzleşmeler bekliyor. Yanlarına yeni arkadaşlar ve müttefikler katılacak. Birlikte Moka'nın kolyesinin ve soyunun sırlarını keşfedecekler...
description.pt-br:
A história continua onde a primeira temporada parou apenas alguns meses no futuro. Youkai Gakuen foi reparado e o novo semestre está em andamento.

Tsukune ea gangue estão de volta, e mais poderoso do que nunca. A verdadeira identidade de Anti-Tese é aliviada. Com os novos adversários que se desenham no horizonte, e algo muito mais sinistro que a gangue já enfrentou antes. Tsukune está lutando com o monstro dentro dele. Com a ajuda de Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby, e Yukari. Tsukune treina para obter o seu sangue de vampiro sob controle e a força para proteger o que ele tanto preza.

A nova temporada se concentra mais nas meninas, o seu passado, e suas famílias. Novos confrontos esperam. Novos amigos e aliados vão se juntar a eles por seu lado. Juntos, eles vão descobrir os segredos do rosário de Moka, e a sua linhagem...

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

However, his secret is at risk of being revealed. And it all started with a threesome with the Alpha Chayoung whom Gyuah drunkenly meets again in a club.

description.ar: في الشرق العظيم ، تقع قاره عظيمه تسمى رودينوس في يوم ما ، وصل جسم طائر مجهول في المجال الجوي لمقاطعة كوا-توين ، الجسم الطائر المجهول كان معارضا لجو المقاطعة الاعتيادي ، فلم تتقبله المقاطعة ، لكن كان هذا الجسم الطائر مجرد نذير لشيء اكثر صدمة بعيدًا عن البحر الشرقي ، ظهرت فجاه مجموعة من الجزر ، تسمي نفسها دولة اليابان وفقا لهم ، تم نقل أمتهم الى عالم آخر والآن يجدون انفسهم منفصلين عن عالمهم القديم ويجب عليهم البقاء على قيد الحياة في العالم الجديد ، كيف ستتفاعل اليابان مع البلدان الاصليه في العالم الجديد؟ هل سيرحبون بها كصديقه ام كعدو؟ هذه قصه الدوله التي تسمى باليابان التي تغرق في عاصفه فوضويه في العالم
description.en:
In the Great Orient, lies a continent called Rodenius. One day, an unidentified flying object arrived at Qua-Toyne Principality’s airspace. 
That UFO defied the Principality’s common sense, but it was just a harbinger of something even more shocking.  
  
Far to the eastern sea, a group of islands suddenly appeared. The country of the islands called itself: Japan.
According to them, their nation had been transported to another world.  
  
Now finding themselves separated from their old world and must survive in the new one, how will Japan interact with the native countries of this world? Will they greet it as a friend or as an enemy?  
  
This is a story of the country called Japan as it was engulfed in the chaotic storm of this new world.

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!

description.en:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/261)
description.ru:
Сасаки, переутомлённый служащий, каждый раз проживает обычный напряжённый день ради единственного света в конце туннеля: Ямада, жизнерадостная продавщица в его любимом магазинчике.
В один день, Сасаки задержался на работе и когда он возвращался домой через магазинчик, смена Ямады давно закончилась. Однако, когда он вышел, то заметил молодую женщину с пирсингом курящую за магазином.
description.vi: Sasaki - một người đàn ông làm công ăn lương, vượt qua những ngày làm việc mệt nhoài nhờ có tia sáng nơi cuối đường hầm: Yamada - nhân viên bán hàng luôn vui tươi tại siêu thị tiện lợi yêu thích của anh. Một ngày nọ, Sasaki phải ở lại công ty đến muộn vì một cuộc họp nên khi đến cửa hàng, Yamada đã hết giờ làm việc. Tuy nhiên, khi sắp rời đi, anh để ý thấy một cô gái trẻ đeo những chiếc khuyên xỏ đang ngồi hút thuốc phía sau cửa hàng…
description.es-la: Sasaki, un asalariado con exceso de trabajo, pasa por un día estresante promedio solo por una sola luz al final del túnel: Yamada, la siempre alegre empleada de su tienda de conveniencia favorita. Un día, Sasaki se toma una cantidad extra de tiempo en una reunión de la empresa, y cuando llega a la tienda de conveniencia, Yamada ya se había marchado. Sin embargo, cuando se va, se da cuenta de que una mujer joven con piercings fuma detrás de la tienda......
description.pt-br:
Sasaki, um assalariado sobrecarregado, passa por um dia estressante comum apenas por uma única luz no fim do túnel: Yamada, o sempre alegre balconista de sua loja de conveniência favorita.

Um dia, Sasaki leva um tempo extra em uma reunião da empresa e, quando chega à loja de conveniência, Yamada já bateu o ponto. No entanto, ao sair, ele percebe uma jovem com piercings fumando atrás da loja. O que vai se desenrolar?

description.en: Hero Filina’s party is on the brink of annihilation in the face of a powerful Demon Lord. The almighty demon proposes to spare their lives on one condition - that he may swap bodies with the hero for a year. Atty, a Priest and Filina’s childhood friend, naturally objects to the proposal, but Filina agrees to the terms to protect her companions. Thus begins a new journey for the Demon Lord, naive to the ways of the world, and the quirky group of adventurers, as they set out to vanquish the new Demon Lord once and for all...!!

description.pl: Miyuki-san jest młodą kobietą urodzoną w Kyoto. Moje relacje z nią nie są dobre. Ponieważ... "Jesteś bardzo dobry w pochlebianiu". Czy te słowa są szczere? Czy tylko na pokaz? Frustrująca historia miłosna, w której nasze wzajemne uczucia wciąż mijają się z celem.

description.en: A successful but annoying dad got gender-swapped and became a beautiful girl. Now he has lost his job and has to depend on his son while slowly starting anew.
description.ru:
Однажды в комнату Тацуи заходит красивая девушка... и, к его удивлению оказывается его отцом, который полностью изменился из-за шока от увольнения с работы! !
Хотя он и растерян перед своим отцом, потерявшим все (?), меняются ли мало-помалу отношения между родителем и ребенком, которые раньше были далекими? ? ?
Отец Тацуи потерял все. Тацуя с недоумением смотрит на отца, но расстояние между отцом и сыном постепенно сокращается...?
Отец – это мать, а сын – это отец? Нет, мой лучший друг — мой отец, а мой отец — мой лучший друг...?
Новая комедия TS, которая, несмотря на то, что в социальных сетях ее называют "физиологически невозможной", на самом деле является удивительной историей отца и сына, которая согреет ваше сердце!!!

A boy abandoned at birth and raised by rats, with the mysterious power to control them, grows up seeing

description.en:
A romantic comedy of uncertain characters. Sagimiya Ryou, the main character, woke up as a girl one day because of the effects of an unknown sex change syndrome. Ryou, now living with this rare syndrome, meets Mikami Nagisa on a tour of Tensei Gakuen high school. As the two find each other in a cosplay cafe, Ryou discovers Nagisa's secret.

A (physical) mixed romantic comedy!

description.ja: ある日突然、性転換症候群の影響で女の子になってしまった主人公・鷺宮了を中心とした、男女あやふやなキャラクターたちが織り成すクロッシングラブコメディ。“性転換症候群”という稀な体質の鷺宮了は、高校の学校見学で出会った水上凪沙に憧れを抱き、凪沙のいる天清学園へ入学することになった。２人が再会を果たしたのは凪沙が働くコスプレ喫茶で、さらに凪沙にはヒミツが――？

description.pt-br:

description.en:
Collection of four stories about bullying and how people can react and survive it.  
1) The Final Loop  
2) And Then There Was You  
3) Watercolour Girl  
4) Gorbachev's Seed.
description.ru:
История 1 - Замкнутый круг

Если человеку причинили боль, имеет ли он право ранить других? И сможет ли месть вылечить разбитое сердце?

История 2 - А в конце был ты

Как объяснить другу детства, что он уже давно не просто друг, если от волнения голос просто отказывается служить? Но, возможно, действия важнее слов?

История 3 - Девушка цвета неба

Людям, выделяющимся из толпы, всегда приходится нелегко. И за то, чтобы остаться собой, иногда приходится платить самым дорогим. Так не лучше ли просто подстроиться под окружающих и жить спокойно?

История 4 - Семена Горбачёва

Стоит ли гоняться за мечтой, которую непременно растопчет жестокая реальность? Ведь если не питать надежд, не испытаешь и разочарования...

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me "Master"!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

description.en: Suddenly a high school student Subaru Natsuki has been summoned to another world on the way back from the convenience store. With the biggest crisis of his life being summoned to another world and no sign of the one who summoned him things become worse when he is attacked. But when he is saved by a mysterious silver-haired girl with a fairy cat, Subaru co-operates with the girl to return the favor. When they finally manage to get a clue Subaru and the girl are attacked and killed by someone. Subaru then awakens in the place he was summoned and notices the ability he gained "Returns by Death" a helpless boy that only has the ability to rewind time by dying. And beyond the despair can he save the girl from the fate of death!
description.ru: После спасения жизни Эмилии и возвращения ей инсигнии, Нацуки Субару был приглашен в особняк к лорду, где живет Эмилия. Нацуки устраивается на работу дворецким, и всё идёт хорошо, но вот только спустя несколько дней обнаруживается, что он опять откатился назад во времени, на момент, когда он только появился в особняке. Кто же в этот раз замочил бедного Нацуки?
description.pt-br: O estudante do ensino médio Natsuki Subaru foi convocado para um mundo de fantasia, enquanto estava nocaminho para casa vindo de uma loja de conveniência! Com base em seu conhecimento de histórias onde as pessoas são transportados para outros mundos, ele assumiu que ele deve ter algum tipo de super poder, mas essa suposição acabou deixando ele espancadoe quase morto durante um assalto. Ele é resgatado por uma meio-elfo, Satera, e seu companheiro, um gato mágico pequeno chamado Puck. Eles estão procurando por algo que foi roubado dela, e Subaru decide ajudar. No entanto, muito em breve, ele descobre que ele de fato tem uma habilidade especial. Quando ele morre, ele começa sua aventura novamente a partir do momento em que ele foi convocado para o mundo de fantasia. Será que ele vai ser capaz de usar sua habilidade para ajudar Satera?

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.  
Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

But her life takes a rapid turn when her husband is discovered dead after the first night on board… And that's only the start of Mariko's great adventure.

Humanity lost the war. Businessmen who sold out their fellow compatriots, hunters who turned to the monsters, stepping on countless human corpses, all in order to earn profit. The otherworldly monsters that entered our world seized it bit by bit like a raging fire. That was until Zuo Chi arrived. 
"Back then you all were gladly invading our world, so why are you weeping now?"
description.fr:

Des hommes d'affaires ont trahi leurs compatriotes, et des chasseurs se sont transformés en monstres, piétinant d'innombrables cadavres humains, tout cela pour le profit. Les créatures d'un autre monde ont envahi le nôtre, le conquérant peu à peu comme un feu dévorant. Mais alors que tout semblait perdu, Zuo Chi est apparu.

description.en:
High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

description.en:
Bell Cranel is just trying to find his way in the world. Of course, in his case, the “world” is an enormous dungeon filled with monsters below a city run by gods and goddesses with way too much time on their hands. He’s got big dreams but not much more when a roll on the random encounter die brings him face-to-face with the girl of his dreams—but what’s an amateur adventurer got to offer a brilliant swords woman? And what if the lonely goddess who sponsors his solo adventuring gets jealous?

(Series was cancelled in 2018 for an unknown reason and restarted in 2020 under a sequel title.)
description.ru: Огромный город Орарио - всего лишь вход в подземный лабиринт, широко известный как "Подземелье". Люди приходят туда за славой, честью, приходят, надеясь получить все то, что захотят. И именно здесь парень, мечтающий стать авантюристом, знакомится с маленькой богиней, не нашедшей ни одного последователя.

description.en: A spin-off focusing on Princess Pinya's (from "Gate - Thus the JSDF Fought There!") life before the "Gate" opening to the other world event.

On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
description.ru:
В день, когда мастер кендо Шихо решает всё бросить и помочь своей матери-одиночке в управлении небольшим ресторанчиком, он узнаёт о том, что его младшая сестра Шиён, которая училась в университете Сеула, покончила с собой. 
Во время похорон Шихо замечает кое-что странное. 
Чтобы узнать правду и отомстить за смерть сестры, Шихо снова берёт в руки уже знакомый меч и начинает свою собственную войну.

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.ja: 1mmでも図に乗った事がある元天才の君へ1万年に1人の天才魔女“ナユ”の魔力が枯れた！？天才ゆえに許されてきたあれやこれのツケが、今ブーメランのように突き刺さっていく…そんなナユが助けを求めたのは、自分のことが大好きな教え子の小麦くん。だいぶ痛いけどなんだか放って置けない奇妙な2人の共同生活が始まった！
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

description.ar:
بيت Targayel ، سيف الإمبراطور ومجد الإمبراطورية. بيت ترجايل ، واسمه محترم ، كان محكوما عليه بالفشل. لم يكونوا محكومين عليهم فقط ، لقد تم تدميرهم. فقط لتغطية نفقاتهم ، تخفي Elje هويتها وتذهب إلى الحرب. بعد عودتها إلى المنزل ، اعتقدت Elje التي صنعت لنفسها اسمًا من خلال مهارتها المذهلة في المبارزة واكتسبت ثروة أن كل ما عليها فعله هو أن تعيش حياة سعيدة. بشكل غير متوقع زواج سياسي رتب بأوامر الإمبراطور! كان شريكها شان كريكسوس ، نائب قائد الجيش الإمبراطوري ، الذي أنقذته في الحرب .......

---

description.en:
House Targael, the sword of the Emperor and the glory of the Empire. House Targael, whose name was respectable, was doomed. They weren’t just doomed, they were destroyed. Just to make ends meet, Elze hides her identity and goes to war. After returning home, Elze, who made a name for herself through her amazing swordsmanship and gained a fortune, thought that all she had to do was live a happy life. Unexpectedly, a political marriage was arranged by the Emperor’s orders! Her partner to be was Shan Kiraxus, deputy commander of the Imperial Army, whom she had saved in the war…

---
After my family fell on hard times, I, Hergenes Targael, disguised myself as a male mercenary named Herge to make money. Along the way, I rescued and met Shaun Kyroxus, a formidable ally who I abruptly left when I was needed back home. Sometime later, I am now part of an arranged marriage with none other than... Shaun?! He's dying to see Herge again, and it's only a matter of time before he finds out! I'm not sure if this marriage will work out, and what do I do when he finds out?!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97866)
description.es:
La Casa Targael, la espada del Emperador y la gloria del Imperio. La Casa Targael, cuyo nombre era respetable, estaba condenada. No sólo estaban condenados, sino que fueron destruidos. Para poder subsistir, Elze oculta su identidad y va a la guerra. Tras regresar a casa, Elze, que se hizo un nombre gracias a su asombrosa habilidad con la espada y ganó una fortuna, pensó que lo único que tenía que hacer era vivir una vida feliz. Inesperadamente, ¡se concertó un matrimonio político por orden del Emperador! Su futura pareja era Shan Kiraxus, subcomandante del Ejército Imperial, a quien salvó en la guerra...

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

description.fr:
La famille Targayel est considéré comme l'épée de l'empereur et la gloire de l'empire. Cependant, la réputation du nom de la famille est détruite obligeant Elje à cacher son identité et à partir pour la guerre.

Elle rentre finalement chez elle après s'être fait un nom avec son incroyable maîtrise de l'épée et avoir gagné beaucoup d'argent, pensant qu'il n'y avait plus rien à faire pour être heureuse, une nouvelle lui tombe dessus comme un coup de tonnerre: un mariage arrangé! Avec nulle autre que Shan Kiraxus, le commandant adjoint de l'armée impériale, à qui Elje a sauvé la vie pendant la guerre...

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

description.ko:
황제의 검이자 제국의 영광, 타르가옐 가(家). 그러나 이름만 그럴듯한 타르가옐 백작가는 망했다. 그냥 망한 게 아니라, 쫄딱 망했다. 단지 먹고 살기 위해서, 엘제는 정체를 감추고 전쟁에 참전한다. 경이로운 검술로 이름을 날리고, 돈도 두둑하게 벌어서 집으로 돌아온 엘제는 이제 행복해질 일만 남았다고 생각했으나- 갑자기 날아든 날벼락 같은 소식, 황명으로 인한 정략결혼! 그 상대는 엘제가 전쟁에서 목숨을 구해줬던 제국군의 부사령관, 샨 키락서스인데...

description.pt:
Casa Targael, a espada do Imperador e a glória do Império. A Casa Targael, cujo nome era respeitável, estava condenada. Eles não estavam apenas condenados, eles foram destruídos. Para sobreviver, Elze esconde sua identidade e vai para a guerra. Depois de voltar para casa, Elze, que fez seu nome por meio de sua incrível habilidade com a espada e ganhou uma fortuna, pensou que tudo o que ela precisava fazer era viver uma vida feliz. Inesperadamente, um casamento político foi arranjado por ordem do imperador! Seu futuro parceiro era Shan Kiraxus, vice-comandante do Exército Imperial, que ela salvou na guerra.

description.ru:
Дом Таргаэь, меч Императора и слава Империи. Дом Таргаэль, чье имя было респектабельным, был обречен. Они были не просто обречены, они были уничтожены. Просто чтобы свести концы с концами, Эргенес скрывает свою личность и отправляется на войну. Вернувшись домой, Эргенес, которая сделала себе имя благодаря своему удивительному мастерству фехтования и сколотила состояние, подумала, что все, что ей нужно было сделать, - это жить счастливой жизнью. Неожиданно по приказу императора был устроен политический брак! Ее будущим партнером был Шань Кираксус, заместитель командующего Имперской армией, которого она спасла во время войны...

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

description.vi:
Nhà Targayel, thanh gươm của Hoàng đế và vinh quang của Đế chế.
Nhà Targayel, cái tên đáng kính, đã phải diệt vong. Họ không chỉ phải chịu đựng mà còn bị tiêu diệt.

Chỉ để kiếm sống, Elje che giấu danh tính của mình và tham gia chiến tranh.
Sau khi trở về nhà, Elje, người đã tạo dựng tên tuổi nhờ kiếm thuật tuyệt vời của mình và có được một tài sản kếch xù nghĩ rằng tất cả những gì cô ấy phải làm là sống một cuộc sống hạnh phúc.

Không ngờ, một cuộc hôn nhân chính trị đã được sắp đặt theo lệnh của Hoàng đế!
Đối tác của cô ấy là Shan Crixus, phó chỉ huy của Quân đội Đế quốc, người mà cô ấy đã cứu trong cuộc chiến…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

description.zh:
皇帝的剑，帝国的荣耀，塔尔加耶尔家。 但是名字像模像样的塔尔加耶尔伯爵家却完蛋了。 不是完了，而是非常彻底的完了。 为了维持生计，埃尔杰隐瞒了身份，参加了战争。 以惊人的剑术出名，赚了很多钱回到家的埃尔杰认为现在只剩下让自己幸福这件事了- 突如其来的晴天霹雳般的消息，皇命的政治婚姻！ 对方是埃尔杰在战争中救了他一命的帝国军的副司令官，沙恩·基拉克萨斯…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

description.pt-br:
A espada do imperador e a glória do império, a família Targayel é famosa por seu gênio na esgrima, mas em algum momento, uma criança com talento para a esgrima não nasce, e a família Targayell naturalmente vai à beira da destruição. Mas Elje, a filha mais velha da família, disfarça-se de homem e participa na guerra para salvar a família. Quando ela volta para casa depois de fazer um nome para si mesma com sua incrível esgrima e ganhar muito dinheiro, pensava que só havia uma coisa a fazer para ser feliz. No entanto, o imperador diz para Elje se casar por acordo. Incapaz de desobedecer ao imperador, Elje decide se casar com ele, a Shan Kiraxus com quem ela lutou na guerra. O oponente é Shan Kiraxus, o vice-comandante do Exército Imperial, que ele escolheu, cuja vida salvou na guerra...

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)

皇帝的劍，帝國的榮耀，塔爾加耶爾家。但是名字像模像樣的塔爾加耶爾伯爵家卻完蛋了。

altTitles.en: When I started streaming in another world, I ended up creating a large number of Yandere followers.

description.en:
Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming.

Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself.

This is not the tale of just a streamer… but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.
description.ja: 剣と魔法の世界アタラシア――その世界に生きる一人の転生者が配信活動に手を出した。 数多くの娯楽はあれど、そのようなモノが存在しなかった世界で彼はたちまち有名になった。 これは異世界で唯一の配信者……ではなく、ハイシンシャになろうと考えた少年の物語である。
description.vi: Anh nhân vật chính của chúng ta được chuyển sinh sang thế giới có sự tồn tại của ma thuật. Sở hữu trong mình sức mạnh bá ko tả nổi, anh sẽ đánh bại quái vật để kiếm sống ư? Không, anh chê, anh muốn theo đuổi đam mê, anh muốn làm streamer để kiếm sống.

altTitles.ja: Minamike
みなみけ
南家

description.en:
*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates

altTitles.ja: 奇人画報

description.en:
1-6. Collecting #1-#6  
A girl collects everything her crush touches; a man keeps a photo album of women giving him blowjobs; schoolboys plays a sexual card game; a lunchbox factory girl collects vomit; a man gathers his missing girlfriend's body parts; a suicidal girl joins a group of women who've made abortion into a grotesque art.  
  
7. Harakiri  
A world where cutting your stomach is the newest fashionable trend among schoolgirls.  
  
8. Holy Night  
Santa is terrorizing the Japanese by flooding everyone with unwanted gifts. The only way to stop him from sending more is to convince him that you're happy with what you've got, or so people think.  
  
9. Voracious Itches  
Putting worms under the skin can be an addictive pleasure.

title.en: Ore wa Seikan Kokka no Akutoku Ryoshu

altTitles.ja: 俺は星間国家の悪徳領主

altTitles.en: I'm the Evil Lord of an Intergalactic Empire!

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou o Lorde Vilão da Nação Interestelar

altTitles.id: Aku adalah Penguasa Jahat dari Kekaisaran Antargalaksi!

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore wa Seikan Kokka no Akutoku Ryoshu

description.en:
In his past life, Liam was hardworking and honest. This got him nothing but debt and betrayal. Now he’s been reborn as the ruling noble of a planet.

Time for some payback.

This life he’ll grind the world under his heel! He’s only looking out for himself. All his underlings will suffer! But try as he might, his tyranny only seems to make his subjects happier.
description.id:
Liam sera banfield adalah reincarnator. dia bereinkarnasi di dunia fantasy pedang dan sihir. Tapi pada saat peradaban sudah siap membuat kemajuan ke luar angkasa, ceritanya terjadi di sebuah kerajaan antar galaksi, sebuah universitas seperti opera ruang angkasa di mana senjata humanoid dan pesawat ruang angkasa saling melengkapi. Liam, yang telah menjelma menjadi keluarga bangsawan dalam masyarakat monarki. memiliki ambisi untuk suatu hari menjadi raja jahat di kehidupan sebelumnya. sayangnya Liam telah kehilangan segalanya dan mati dalam keputusasaan. 

"sangat bodoh hidup untuk orang lain."
 "Aku akan hidup untuk diriku sendiri"

 ia mulai menuju kehidupan keduanya, tetapi malah disembah sebagai penguasa yang berbudi luhur karena perbedaan nilainya. Akankah Liam dapat dengan aman menjadi tuan yang jahat?
description.ja:
星間国家アルグランド帝国の辺境惑星を治める伯爵家に転生し、幼くして領主となったリアム・セラ・バンフィールド。持ち前の善良さ故に、妻や会社に裏切られた前世の反省から今世では“奪う側”として生きると決意する――

「悪徳領主になって、悪の限りを尽くす！」

だが、受け継いだ領地は虐げるまでもない寂れっぷりで……止む無くリアムは自領の建て直しから着手することに。人工知能を重用！ 宇宙艦隊を縮小！ 不正貴族を一刀両断！常識など無視して思うがまま傍若無人に振る舞うのだが、結果的に領民は豊かになり、好感度がうなぎ登りで……!?
description.pt-br: Liam Sera Canfield é um reincarnator. Ele reencarnou em um universo fantasioso de espada e feitiçaria, onde a civilização já avançou para o espaço sideral. A história se passa em um império intergaláctico, assim como uma space opera, com armas humanoides e batalhas de naves espaciais. Liam, que incarnou em uma família de aristocratas em uma sociedade monárquica, tem a ambição de se tornar um lorde maligno. Em sua vida anterior, liam infelizmente acabou perdendo tudo e morrendo em desespero. “ É tolice viver pelos outros.” “ Eu irei viver por mim mesmo” Com esses sentimentos no peito ele começa sua segunda vida, só que ao invés disso ele é idolatrado como um virtuoso líder por causa da diferença de valores. Será que Liam conseguirá se tornar um lorde maligno?

altTitles.ja: αの家の子

description.en:
Nishimiya Kouga is from a distinguished alpha family which puts severe importance on being purebred.

At work, the person he acknowledges as his rival in business performance is Houjou Misaki, who is also an alpha.

Kouga has been putting some distance from his alpha supremacist grandfather, the current head of the Nishimiya clan. But one day, on the latter's orders, the family butler, Harada, visited Kouga with a child.

Haruto, the omega child, is a distant relative and Kouga has been ordered to care for him. Kouga, despite his disgust with how selfish alphas are, felt pity for the meek and frail-looking Haruto and reluctantly complied.

Now, Kouga is struggling to take care of Haruto who to his surprise, turned out to be a really energetic boy. At the same time, Kouga found out that Houjou also sends his child to the same kindergarten that Haruto attends.

And that's when he discovered a shocking truth about Houjou

altTitles.ja: 世話焼きマフィアと薄幸少女

altTitles.en: The Meddlesome Mafia and The Hapless Girl

description.en:
A girl who was sold by her mother and left without relatives is taken in by the boss of the most terrifying Chinese mafia. She thought her life was over, but she was taken to a luxury boutique to get clothes...?!

"Don't be mistaken. These favors from me are so that I can sell you at a high price."

A love comedy between a tough-looking boy with a sharp attitude and a cute girl with a good heart!

altTitles.ja: 化学部のメガネ

altTitles.vi: Mắt kính của Câu lạc bộ Hóa học

description.en:
"Are you really fine with me?"
"If I wasn't fine with you, I wouldn't have asked in the first place."
"But isn't that the same as what we've already been doing?"
"Yeah, so we can also add kissing." 

Two members of the chemistry club promised each other that they would go from friends to lovers at the summer's end of their sophomore year. Akui (black full-framed glasses) is not quite sure what a "boyfriend" is, while Sako (light-rimmed glasses) seems cheerful, even though he insists it's just an experiment. The four-eyes of the chemistry club are clumsy but sincere in their first experience of experimenting with love.

altTitles.ja: オープンセサミ

description.en: Danjou Yamato is a high-school student who lives in the countryside and is the boxing champion of the region. However, when his family has to move out to live in Tokyo, he is transfered to a school in Tokyo that was previously an all-girls school. Girls have a lot of power and give the guys a hard time. But Yamato will not bow down to the power of the girls, and on his way to claim power for the guys in the school, he finds out something about his past… something that he had forgotten long ago…

altTitles.ja: 忍者パパ

description.en: Nobu, a 32 year old salary man, is spreading justice from the shadows as a ninja while maintaining his family and working at his company. What he doesn't know is that he is being followed by mysterious persons and his gifted family. Can he put everything in order?
